question:
Consider the following government portals / apps and the respective services provided by them:
  1. Saubhagya Web Portal - Monitoring household progress
  2. e-Sahaj portal - Security clearance for setting up businesses
  3. TAMRA - statutory clearances for mining operations
Which of the above is/ are correct?
explanation: Saubhagya Web Portal Saubhagya Web Portal is a platform for monitoring household electrification progress, which would disseminate information on Household Electrification Status (State, District, village-wise), Household Progress on live basis, State-wise Target vs Achievement, Monthly Electrification Progress, etc. e-Sahaj Portal e-Sahaj portal was launched to facilitate individuals and private companies in seeking security clearance for setting up businesses in certain sensitive sectors Ministry of Home affairs is the nodal Ministry for security clearances in certain sensitive sectors before issue of licence/permit, permission, contract etc, to companies/ bidders/individuals by the administrative Ministry. TAMRA TAMRA mobile application and portal is to ensure transparent award of statutory clearances for mining operations. TAMRA stands for “Transparency, Auction Monitoring and Resource Augmentation”. The portal covers block-wise, state-wise and mineral-wise information of the blocks to be auctioned, monitors various statutory clearances, and also highlights the additional resources generated through e-Auction. In case of delay in obtaining any clearances, TAMRA will send triggers to the concerned authority so that the remedial steps can be taken immediately by those responsible.
